translations: 勾引人的女人，引诱人的女子

sentences.sentence: Brand New Ed Hardy Women's Temptress Skull Black Watch!
sentences.translation: 品牌新海关哈女性氏风月颅骨黑色手表！

sentences.sentence: The typical 007 movie has two Bond girls: the girl friend and the temptress.
sentences.translation: 典型的007电影邦德有两个女孩：女孩的朋友和妖妇。

sentences.sentence: The dark - haired temptress and Master Van Dort slipped away into the night!
sentences.translation: 那个黑发的迷人女子和范。德特一起消失在了黑夜中！
